Homer Bubbins, better known as the Bad Twin Bubbins, was a halfling member of The Guild from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Homer Bubbins was born in the town of Beregost in West Faer√ªn. At some point, Homer Bubbins pursued a religious career in the Open Hand Temple of Ilmater in Baldurs Gate. Or, at least, that was what Mama Bubbins believed. Homer wrote letters home, continuing the charade, claiming to serve and live happily under Father Lorgan and even claiming to have reached the title of the "right-hand temple manager." In reality, the man known as the "Bad Twin Bubbins" joined the infamous Guild.
In the , Homers twin brother, Flymber Bubbins, became inspired by his brothers lies and decided to move to Baldurs Gate and join the Open Hand Temple, as reported by Mama Bubbins in a birthday letter to her prodigal son.
Homer Bubbins was present at The Guilds Guildhall in Baldurs Gates Undercellar during the Absolute crisis of 1492 DR and an attempt by the Zhentarim to seize control of the weakened criminal cartel. However, Bad Twin Bubbinss survival past the tumult of these two conflicts remains unconfirmed.
